verse.text: And it shall come to pass at that day
for ye are not my people
and it shall come to pass that in the place
unto them Ye are not my people
for she is not my wife
And I will not have mercy
I will also cause all her mirth
And it shall be at that day
and they shall no more be remembered
and will make them to lie down
And it shall come to pass in that day
her unto me in the earth
thou shalt not play the harlot
thee that thou shalt be no priest
against me therefore will I change
And there shall be like people
and they have gone a whoring
is toward you because ye have been a snare
though I have been a rebuker
of them and they have not known
Therefore will I be unto Ephraim
For I will be unto Ephraim
and he will bind us up
there is none among them that calleth
upon them I will bring them down
unto them! for they have fled
unto them! because they have transgressed
against me though I have redeemed
but not to the most High
He shall come as an eagle
that they may be cut off
against them how long will it be ere
it therefore it is not God
now shall they be among the Gentiles
shall be unto him to sin
shall be unto him to sin
them not now will he remember
for thou hast gone a whoring
them that there shall not be a man
also to them when I depart
unto him and they shall be wanderers
unto himself according to the multitude
now shall they be found faulty
against them when they shall bind
the corn but I passed over
and I was to them as they that take off
them because of their own counsels
How shall I give thee up
How shall I give thee up
of thee and I will not enter
And I that am the LORD
will yet make thee to dwell
Therefore they shall be as the morning
that is driven with the whirlwind
Therefore I will be unto them as a lion
of her whelps and will rend
thyself but in me is thine help
is any other that may save
upon him he is an unwise
in the place of the breaking forth
I will be as the dew
shall be as the olive tree
thereof shall be as the wine
shall say What have I to do any more with idols
him I am like a green
